backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, and access control with storage, maps, and role‑based admin operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three lobby‑page refactor features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for all major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and config.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app with cache‑busting directives and versioned script import.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router setup defining root, lobby, chatroom, and admin routes with conditional header/footer rendering and 404 fallback.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar selection dialog supporting uploads, GIF search via Giphy, avatar removal, and updating the stored avatar.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat interface handling message fetching, auto‑scroll, replies, pinned video, and sending messages with media support.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom preview card with video/Twitter thumbnails, live status, and metadata, fetching Twitch and Twitter previews as needed.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with fields for text, categories, and media via upload, video URLs, or Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection, adapting UI when inside a chatroom.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: A no-op component that renders nothing, preserving anonymous app behavior.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with timestamps, reactions, replies, and embedded media including YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, and voice messages.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Provides a message input box with image upload, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URL handling, and audio recording capabilities.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in a chatroom with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: File is empty or missing content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player with waveform visualization and synced playback state, handling metadata loading and play/pause control.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Ensures chatroom data is freshly refetched by purging stale cache entries when the backend actor becomes ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for chatrooms, messages, and user data, including search logic and localStorage-backed user identity helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles, theme variables, mobile input fixes, and custom styles for the voice message range slider.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend config constants for Giphy API use.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a helper to format numbers using compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from Giphy, mapping API responses into a simplified GIF format with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client-side image compression with resizing, quality settings, and progress reporting, skipping GIF/SVG and falling back safely.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to build lightweight tweet previews with caching and deduplication of requests.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching of Twitter preview objects with validation, expiration, and cache key generation based on tweet IDs.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts video IDs and metadata from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generates appropriate thumbnail or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page requiring authentication to view and delete chatrooms, handling session-based login, refetching, and UI for deletion.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, handles loading/error states, increments view count once, and renders ChatArea when data is ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays chatroom list using a single canonical query with debounced search, category filters, and recovery handling, plus navigation and create-room dialog.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state and feature requirements focused on fixing lobby chatroom loading by using a single canonical query with client-side filtering.
